Title: Establishes local wage enforcement authority in the city of New York
Summary: Establishes local wage enforcement authority in the city of New York; authorizes the city of New York to establish a minimum wage that is higher than the statewide minimum wage.
LawCode: Ren §665 to be §669, add §§665 & 666, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing local wage enforcement authority in the city of New York and authorizing the city of New York to establish a minimum wage that is higher than the statewide minimum wage
